channel.title: cron on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in cron on Just a Memo

item.title: Cron
item.description: Install emerge -avq vixie-cron Crontab %filename: Crontab * * * * * command to be executed - - - - - | | | | | | | | | +----- day of week (0 - 6) (Sunday=0) | | | +------- month (1 - 12) | | +--------- day of month (1 - 31) | +----------- hour (0 - 23) +------------- min (0 - 59)
